author: Peter Antonio mywatch.london
comment: Not worth the purchase
title: Can't see the pic im taking on my smartwatch so dont see the point of this app

author: KLik S.
comment: How to add more color effects. I have only none.

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Hi Kikery, the color effects are available in the menu per your Android version. Thank you.

title: Need advice

author: not in use
comment: Nice update!! Loved the Chromecast feature from the photo gallery and pictures organization. Lots of great features - voice control, HDR mode, histogram, exposure control, color effects, burst mode, and smart watch control for Android wear!

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your review and liking the photo gallery. A new release is coming very soon that further enhance the photo gallery feature!

title: Wow camera app. Much better than anything else out there. Love the way it lets me use my LG watch as remote.

author: James Wesley
comment: Love the chromecasting feature. Quite innovative app.  Like the voice control update and the remote control feature with Android smartwatch.  RGB histogram, photo effects, continuous photos, HDR, exposure control and pinch zoom!  It got it all!

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your review. Much appreciated. We are aggressively working to further improve our app. Glad to see that you noticed the Flash feature and its utility for video capture under low light situations.

title: Killer camera app with chromecast - love the smartwatch photo preview and nice professional icon layout

comment: Its really buggy! Please just use the normal phone gallery and make a seperate gallery app for editing. Rest of app is perfect.

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Hi Ryan, thank you for your note.. We have now updated the app to fix this issue. It'll also allow you to use the native phone gallery. Thank you.

title: Please fix the gallery

author: Ivan Djohary
comment: I'm using Samsung Grand Neo Android,but until now I can't using and change the ISO,shutter Speed and the Opening.
title: Something wrong with the operation.

author: Bill Tinsley
comment: Every time I take a photo the app shuts itself down. I'm using a Samsung Galaxy S4. I reported this problem when I bought and downloaded the app over a week ago and haven't heard anything from the developer yet.

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Bill sorry. We have worked to fix the crashes and it should be working now. Please let us know if you continue to see the issue.

title: Crashes Every Time

author: Jennie Westforth
comment: To be moved to ad card plz
title: Give ability

comment: The camera is good, I recommed it.   I seggest some improvement like:  1 - Save to any folder of SD Card which is allowed now in Android 5.0.2 2 - ISO manual regulation (able in Sony Xperia Z3)  Another suggestion:  1 -  In the pro style add some kinds of professional grid to center the image. 2 - Image stabilization, in the stock camera is the option and here does not appear.. 3 - An option to change icons colours, in some circunstances is difficul to see in white.  Question:  The icon of chromecast in the upper right of the screen I dont know how to use it. Is it needed to stay in the main screen ?

author: Daniel Benish
comment: Not buying from this company ok so after I was not satisfied with this app I talked to the developer and he refunded my money this app dose not suit my needs nor my expectations but for many of you this may be just what you need so make your judgment on your experience and not so much off my review the company themselves are very nice people and deserve a shot

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Hi Daniel, Thank you for your nice words. We have completely refunded the order. -------- Looks like you haven't tried all the features. Many of the advanced features are truly not available in native app. Comparable Apps with fewer features are $3-4 each - please note Camera FV as an example. Hoping to earn your higher rating.

title: Worst purchase ever my phone takes better pictures also had the same options this was misleading as well where the reviews I'd be upset if it wasn't only 1.99

author: Megan Anger
comment: Can't adjust iso, shutter speed, or f-stop

author: Louie Canedo
comment: Review Image is too small to see

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Hi Louie, can you please provide more info - the image size can be set in the settings. Thank you. Hoping to earn your higher rating. Regards.

author: Arif Fidaali
comment: Great features but one problem on my HTC Desire 820s when I switch to video it says can only use in landscape mode and the phone is in landscape mode! Please fix so I can give 5 stars

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Hi Arif, thank you for your feedback. We are working on this feature among other priorities and will be able to release an update soon.

title: Nice camera app

author: Franco Sesamo
comment: I am really enjoying this app. The view of histogram and exposure is great. Well done guys !! The quick feedback when asking questions is greatly appreciated :-).

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you so much, Franco. We will continue to earn your support.

author: Richard Glanzer
comment: Great pix with minimal effort. Thank you.

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Richard, thank you for your feedback. Much appreciated!

title: Practical user interface

author: Everall Taljaard
comment: I  normally first torrent an app before I buy but your presentation was to good . It does what it says This is the one to beat

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Dear Everall, thank you so much for your feedback! We are also continuously developing new features! Stay tuned for an awesome feature to be launched within a few weeks or so!! Thank you and so glad to earn your compliments. Kind regards.

title: Everall

author: Guy Taylor
comment: Very cool app, nice look, nice feel...worth five stars but tempted to only give it four cos it looks like I need to go to NASA to learn how to use it properly :)

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Dear Guy. Thank you for your note and five stars. We are working on the User Interface to simplify it in the hopes of not having to fund the NASA scholarships. Will have a major release out this week focused on the UI. Would really value your feedback on what you'd like to see improved further.

title: Awesome

author: Caitlin Miller
comment: Wow update with voice and Android wear smartwatch and voice control and photo preview. Really like the features vs minimal camera features from stock Google android  camera app and other camera apps that are really photo editors..! Great going. , also emailed  with the developer who seems real nice. They promised more features and quick updates. Nice recent update color features, histogram, HDR, exposure control and pinch zoom features.

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Caitlin, thank you for your review. So glad we were able to quickly respond to your questions. Yes we are aggressively working to further improve our app. Thank you for liking the photo organization features.

title: Love the app! Clearly the best camera app on android phones.

author: James Neeper
comment: Love the app, great features, and most of all, the developers are super responsive. I have the moto 360, main part of getting this app, and the wear features didn't work on round faced smart watches. I contacted them and and inside a week they'd fixed the issue. Awesome camera app, great devs, definitely a must have.

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Dear James, thank you for your kind review. We will continue improving this app and plan to launch additional great features to make it the best app.

title: Developers are very responsive

author: Madhur Sharma
comment: Excellent Pro camera app

author: Jim Thomas
comment: A huge upgrade from the stock camera. Well worth the dollar. Suggestion if i may. Prehaps allow preview on android wear of image on camera before picture is taken?  Reason for purchase was wear compatible. But needs to be able to view camera thru wear.  Then 5 star review :)

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Jim, we value your feedback. We implemented the photo post-view mode for smartwatch. Please check it out. We are also working aggressively to build as many features as possible, please continue to provide comments on what else is of value to you.  Hoping to earn your 5-star review.

title: Very nice camera.

author: Harwinder Birdi
comment: Best camera app

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Hi Harwinder, thank you so much for your kind feedback! It means a lot. We hope you tried our smartphone remote control features as well. We are also planning a release this week with pinch and zoom functionality.  Best regards.

title: Awesome

author: Kevin
comment: Has officially replaced my default camera app. Offers great clarity with an easy to use UI. All photos go through my MagicPix before going to social media. 5 stars!
title: Great app!

author: Ada Wang
comment: This camera app is very useful for me.Its functions are better than phone's own camera app.Highly recommend to you!
title: Very good

author: Matt Anderson
comment: Concise interface,intuitive,easy to use and powerful function. Using this app, you can make very high quality photos. Worth having!
title: Professional

author: Inderjeet Singh
comment: Nice job overall. Like the ability to edit the photos as well.

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your review and five star ratings. We are continuing to build even more features to make this the very best app.

title: Excellent photo management with the ability to undelete

author: Scott Holmes
comment: This camera app has many more features than the basic one that came with my phone. I really like that it works in conjunction with my smart watch! Although, it does keep crashing on me?

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you Scott. We have now updated the app with the bug fix for the crash you mentioned. Rest assured our developer team is fully dedicated to enhancing this app. Hoping to earn your five stars!  Thank you for the bug report.

title: Quality Camera!

author: Thái Vũ Văn
comment: This app is pretty nice and easy to use without ads beside. Camera is better than original camera of my phone. I can see that it just have useful icons which clutters the screen and opening camera is really fast. However, icons is black and when using app to take photos at night seems to be hard to find out which icons we need, and this app also did not have customize solution of pictures. Hope you will update with fixed problems i write above. In common, this app is perfect and it won't waste your money.

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you so much and we are working hard to improve the app further. We will address these issues.

title: Really useful app, especially android wear smart watch

author: Trung Duc Nguyen
comment: This app is very useful. Camera of this app is better than stock camera app in my phone. It also works well with Android wear smartwatch. The user interface is modern and easy to use. Good job!

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you.  Your kind feedback is appreciated.

title: Useful app

author: Robi Gorišek
comment: Awesome camera app with very nice gallery and a lot of photo options. I like minimal design and fast response. App opens fast and also capturing picture is very fast. Great app with lot of features.
title: Awesome cam app!

author: hvd hvd
comment: Really useful app. $Only 0.99. Thanks for no ads. This app is pretty nice and easy to use without ads beside. Camera is better than original camera of my phone. I love this app

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you so much for your feedback!

title: Really useful app

author: Cao Luan
comment: I really like this app is great. Thanks to this app, the photos I shoot more beautiful. I feel excited, i thought i was a really tweezers Photographer. thank to developer

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you so much for your feedback!

title: Good app Pro Camera.

author: Lê Hồng Việt Huy
comment: it is very good ! thank you very much!

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your kind feedback. Much appreciated.

title: good app

author: Mohamad Syafiuddin Tukiman
comment: Where is the camera settings? Cos i lost my flash icon. Also..the tap and focus function sometimes never respond. Overall this is a pretty great camera app

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content:
Hi Mohamad, thank you so much for your review. We will be releasing next week a major update which will have detailed settings.

Flash icon is there right on the top left of the screen. Please review. Thanks for your feedback - hoping to earn 5 stars from you.

title: Where....

author: Keshava C
comment: Hai Sir i made 2 times paid how can i refund it on my account please help on this

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Hi Keshav, thank you for your 5 star rating. Please email us your transaction number, and we'll issue refund.

title: HI

author: Narinder Singh
comment: I always thought that Google and Apple did a horrible job managing pictures. So glad to see finally we have an app that organizes pictures so that you can actually use them better. Thank you for giving us this great app and not charging $2.99 as others apps are charging. Superb!

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your review. We will continue to work to keep this app at a low cost and fully ad free. We will be releasing additional features very soon.

title: Love it! So far the best replacement app for the Google Camera.

author: Atul Joshi
comment: It is a very easy to use app with just the functions you need to take great photos, videos and to organize albums. I especially like no clutter and hide away icons so that only the really useful features are at your finger tips without annoying useless icons cluttering the screen. I highly recommend  this app over the native android apps as well as other photo apps.

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you so much for your review. We are working to build many more features and will be launching soon. Our goal is to keep this app ad free. Thank you.

title: Great all in one app to take pictures and organize them

author: pawandeep singh
comment: Taking pictures redefined. The  app is simple to use and takes awesome pictures. A must have. !!!!

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are working hard to build lots of additional capabilities and will be releasing very soon!!

title: Pawandeep Singh

author: Jaswant Singh
comment: like the simple interface and photo organization

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you so much for your review. Much appreciated. Our goal is to enhance our app with powerful features but keep the interface as simple and intuitive as possible. Thank you for your support.

title: much better app

author: tushar chaturvedi
comment: Amazing photo management features!

reply.author: ProCameo Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your review! Glad to see that you liked the photo organization features. We are building many new features that we will be launching very soon. Stay tuned.

title: Great app!
